content: odette scrunchie crochet pattern by cascadefiberworks size 5 yarn hook 5 25-5 75mm elastic or hair tie us terminology yarn suggestions juicy couture luxe velour premier just chenille bernat velvet 1 tie yarn onto the hair tie tip you can crochet over the yarn end but make sure it will still stretch 2 single_crochet 45 around hair tie more or less depending on your yarn size it should be able to stretch still when closed close round with a slip_stitch 3 chain 4 counts as a tc chain 3 more tc in the same place * tc ch3 tc in each stitch slip_stitch closed sew in ends #odettescrunchie so i can see yours find me online https //linktr ee/cascadefiberworks
